codes:
n = int(input())
a = [0] + list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

h = [0] + list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]

s = sum(h)

ans = 10 ** 20
for i in range(1, n + 1):
	r = [0] + list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]
	c = [0] + list(map(int, input().split())) + [0]
	for j in range(i, n + 1):
		r[j] = h[j] + (a[j] - r[j - 1]) * (b[j] - r[j - 1])
		c[j] = h[j] + (a[j] - r[j - 1]) * b[j]
	ans = min(ans, max(r) - min(c))
print(ans if ans < 10 ** 20 else -1)
